alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Alachua and northwestern Marion Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 131 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Williston, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Micanopy, McIntosh and Flemington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion
